title: Watch: Tom Hiddleston and Mia Wasikowska talk working with ghosts in Crimson Peak
text:
Watch: Tom Hiddleston and Mia Wasikowska talk working with ghosts in Crimson Peak 
Published By: TotalFilm.com - Today 
We sat down with Guillermo del Toro, Tom Hiddleston and Mia Wasikowska to find out what the deal is with those creepy ghosts in Crimson Peak...
